tutorial.speak:
On the right side of the page, click the plus sign next to Classrooms.
Enter the name of your classroom.
If you wish to share the upcoming lesson with your teachers via the B1 app, select a volunteer team. These are configured in the planning section of Chums.
If you wish to share the current lesson with your students or their parents via the B1 app, select a parent/student group. These are configured in the groups section of Chums.
Click Save
